greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: binomial(n,k)*(2*n-k)!, n>=0, 0<=k<=n.
comment: Vertex-labeled disconnected Goldstone diagrams with n vertices and k single-particle potentials.
link: P. J. Rossky, M. Karplus, The enumeration of Goldstone diagrams in many-body perturbation theory, J. Chem. Phys. 64 (1976) 1569, equation (9) and Table 1.
xref: Cf. A099022 (row sums), A000142 (diagonal), A010050 (column k=0), A002674 (k=1).
results.author: _R. J. Mathar_, Oct 28 2019
